Header: Provincial Councillor injured in Dambulla attack after the cricket encounter
Content: United National Party Provincial Councillor Tissa Bandara suffered injuries after he was attacked following the cricket encounter which was held at the Dambulla Cricket Grounds yesterday. The Dambulla Police said that Provincial Councilloor Tissa Bandara Herath and a private security officer of Sri Lanka Cricket who were injured in this incident have been hospitalized. A person who was leaving the grounds after the match had assaulted a private security officer who was engaged in handling the traffic and fled. The Police gave chase and finally rounded up this person and assaulted him. The Provincial Councillor said that he was attacked by the Police for rising up against this assault.
